name: Image Filter
author: Nazmul Hassan

sections.description: A simple editing Image tool. Just upload your image and click the button to edit, modify or Filter your image.
sections.installation:
1. Upload image-filter.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
  4. Place [kov_image_filter] shortcode in your page or post.
sections.faq:
Will this work in Gutenberg or Elementor?

It will work in every framework including Gutenberg, Elementor, Wp-Bakery or Classic editor
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release.

Image Filter Features:

  1. Change image Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Vibrance
  2. Give image effects like Vintage, Lomo, Clarity, Sin City and more
  3. You can also remove filters at one click
  4. Download your modified Image.

short_description: A simple plugin to Filter, edit or Modify Image.
description: A simple editing Image tool. Just upload your image and click the button to edit, modify or Filter your image.
